BURSTNET™ VPS - STARTING @ ONLY $5.95/MONTH! All New Plans & Pricing! HOT!!!


BURSTNET™ VIRTUAL PRIVATE SERVERS (VPS) - STARTING @ ONLY $5.95/MONTH!

BurstNET Technologies, Inc.™ Virtual Private Servers (VPS) are a perfect solution for webmasters, designers, developers, and business owners.
BurstNET™ charges a flat rate per month, for cpu, memory, diskspace, and bandwidth allotments, which you can then utilize for any number of websites,
and/or in any method that you desire. BurstNET™ Virtual Private Servers (VPS) are designed for the client who would like to have the highest quality
and reliability in server hardware, with the software and operational features of a dedicated server---all at a price closer to that of Virtual Hosting.
BurstNET™ Virtual Private Servers (VPS) give you the perfect opportunity to operate as a Dedicated Server with root access---to learn the operations of
such without risk, and without the huge outlay of capital. Relax and allow BurstNET™ to maintain the hardware and base operating system of the service,
while you can focus on utilizing the software functionality of the server. As your hosting requirements grow with BurstNET™ Virtual Private Servers, a
jump to Dedicated Servers is well within reach.

BurstNET's™ LINUX VPS product offering is based on the fast growing vePortal™ VPS platform, while our WINDOWS VPS
offering is based on the Parallels VPS platform, Virtuozzo™.

Linux is the traditional VPS web hosting platform, that is extremely reliable and robust. Our most affordable and reliable VPS hosting packages are
Linux based, with prices starting at only $5.95 per month! Available operating systems include: CentOS™, Debian™, Ubuntu™, Fedora™, & Gentoo™.
Control panel software is optionally available on all Linux VPS hosting accounts, including; - CPanel™, DirectAdmin™, & Plesk™. Our Linux VPS
hosting accounts curently run on the vePortal™ platform.

Windows™ 2003 Server VPS hosting provides specific options not available on our LINUX hosting platforms, such as ASP, MS-SQL™, MS-Access™,
.NET™ Framework, Cold Fusion™, and ASP.NET™. Windows™ 2003 Server VPS hosting, as opposed to Linux VPS hosting, is only advantageous if you
require one or some of the features listed above. Plesk™, the Windows™ control panel software, is optionally available on all Windows™ 2003 Server
VPS accounts. Our Windows™ 2003 Server VPS hosting accounts currently run on the Virtuozzo™ platform.


BRAND NEW NETWORK!!! - The BURSTNET™ network has been completely rebuilt/upgraded during 4th QTR 2008, by our recently hired new network engineering staff, with brand new Cisco™ 6500-series routers/switches!

BRAND NEW BILLING/ORDERING SYSTEM!!! - BURSTNET™ has recently integrated automated ordering and billing to replace our older manual processing system!!!

GREEN POWER/OPERATIONS INITIATIVE!!! - BURSTNET™ has recently announced it's eco-friendly initiatives, and release a Green Energy-Efficient Dedicated Server product line!
